All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AssetSetter
Manages the placement and initialization of game assets including objects, NPCs, and monsters across different game levels.
CollisionChecker
Handles collision detection for entities within the game world.
DataStorage
The DataStorage class is a serializable container used to store and retrieve player-related data such as level, life, inventory, and game time.
DbManager
The DbManager class provides an interface to manage the database operations related to saving and loading player data for the game.
Entity
Base class for all game entities including players, NPCs, monsters, and items.
GamePanel
Main game panel that handles the core game loop, rendering, and state management.
Grandpa
Represents the Grandpa NPC character in the game.
KeyHandler
Handles keyboard input for the game, managing different input behaviors based on the current game state.
Main
Main entry point for "The Forgotten Altar of Verdea" game application.
MON_Boss
Represents a boss monster entity in the game - specifically the "Goblin Lord".
MON_Goblin
Represents a Goblin monster entity in the game.
ObjCarrot
Represents a carrot crop that grows through multiple stages and can be harvested.
ObjCave
Represents a mystical cave entrance that serves as a teleportation gateway in the game.
ObjChest
Represents an interactive chest object in the game that can contain loot items.
ObjCup
Represents a Cup object in the game.
ObjDiamond
Represents a Diamond object in the game.
ObjHeart
Represents a Heart object in the game.
ObjPendant
Represents a Pendant object in the game.
ObjPickaxe
Represents a Pickaxe object in the game.
ObjPortal
Represents a mystical portal object that serves as a transportation mechanism in the game.
ObjSword
Represents a Sword object in the game.
Player
Represents the player character in the game.
SaveLoad
The SaveLoad class handles saving and loading game state data such as player stats and inventory to and from a SQLite database via the DbManager.
Sound
Manages audio playback for the game including background music and sound effects.
Tile
Represents a tile in the game world using the Flyweight design pattern.
TileManager
TileManager class implementing the Flyweight pattern for efficient tile management.
UI
Handles all user interface rendering and management for the game.
UtilityTool
Utility class providing helper methods for image processing and manipulation.
Wizard
